message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your share is worth less each round. Let's be realistic, 55-45 is my offer.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bigger share.
Time is running out, and your share keeps shrinking. 52-48 is my final offer.
I'm not giving up yet, meet me in the middle of our last offers.
This is ridiculous, Alice. Let's just split it evenly and call it a day.
